name: Our world has not decayed
description:
When zombies appear in this world, when everything has lost its vitality...
And me and her are the only two lives still active after this last day.
Traveling purposelessly on this ridiculous land.
We are not heroes to save the world, nor are we destroying the genius of the last days.
We are just ordinary life of two ordinary people after the end of the day.
The only thing that is not so ordinary, probably only she is a zombie?
This is a doomsday visual novel. The game consists of 8 exquisite CG‘s, dynamic vertical drawing and nearly 200,000 words with a full voice.
